command-prompt.blurb: Developers can write CLI tools used inside of ROBLOX games

user-testing.blurb: Write tests that any user can play and verify using the command line

physics-lab.blurb: Run physics experiments in parallel for integration testing physics-based features

mvp.blurb: Build a prototype with the core functionality of the game and test if it's fun.

first-solar-system.blurb: A set of planets, moons, and asteroids orbiting a single star

world-environment.blurb: The game can save/load round 2d worlds, which are a collection of blocks and air

ship-environment.blurb: The game can save/load flat 2d rooms, which are a collection of blocks and air

moving-objects.blurb: The game can save/load objects that feel gravity & collide with blocks

gravitational-stability.blurb: Stable celestial bodies are guaranteed not to crash into each other and create a mess

characters.blurb: The game can spawn characters, which die, respawn, move, and jump

proximity-prompt.blurb: Characters can walk up to button blocks & press them

buildings.blurb: Characters can walk into ships/buildings, which have a bigger, separate environment on the 'inside'

character-controls.blurb: Players can spawn a character they control with keyboard/mouse

mobile-character-controls.blurb: Players can control characters on mobile devices

xbox-character-controls.blurb: Players can control characters on the xbox
